meanings.definition: To give assistance or support to
meanings.sent1: She helped her friend carry the heavy books.
meanings.sent2: The teacher helped the students understand the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The kind neighbor helped the lost puppy find its way home.
meanings.sent4: The flashlight helped guide them through the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: His encouraging words helped her feel more confident.

meanings.definition: To make it easier or possible for someone to do something
meanings.sent1: The ramp helped the wheelchair user access the building.
meanings.sent2: The clear instructions helped him assemble the furniture quickly.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella helped keep her dry during the sudden rain shower.
meanings.sent4: The map helped them navigate the unfamiliar city streets.
meanings.sent5: The new software helped streamline the work process.

meanings.definition: To serve or contribute to the success of
meanings.sent1: Her dedication and hard work helped the team win the championship.
meanings.sent2: The fresh ingredients helped make the dish delicious.
meanings.sent3: The positive feedback helped boost his confidence.
meanings.sent4: The timely intervention helped prevent a major disaster.
meanings.sent5: The supportive community helped him achieve his goals.
